name: Shantak
description: A large monstrosity with an unctuous hide and the ability to fly gracefully. It features a terrifying screech and talons capable of inflicting necrotic damage.
memorable: The chilling ability to frighten creatures with its terrifying screech and its slippery hide that challenges riders.
goals: To hunt down prey and assert dominance in its territory.
relations: May be summoned or commanded by powerful spellcasters and could easily coordinate with other like-minded creatures.
environment: Prefers dark and secluded regions where it can use its flight and terrifying presence to its advantage.
strengths: High Strength and Constitution scores, resistant to necrotic damage, and able to see through magical darkness.
weaknesses: Low Intelligence and Charisma scores, making it ineffective in social interactions.
attacks: Can bite and slash with talons, both empowered by necrotic damage.
most_powerful_ability: Insane Tittering, which frightens non-Shantak creatures within range.
senses: Has darkvision up to 120 feet and advantage on perception checks related to sight and smell.
skills: Proficient in perception, enhancing its ability to detect hidden creatures or traps.
additional_information: Has advantage on saving throws against spells due to Magic Resistance.
Can fly without provoking opportunity attacks through Flyby.
Uses Pack Tactics to increase its chances of hitting targets when allies are nearby.
Notable for its survivability and mobility in combat.
Possesses advantages in tracking due to Keen Sight and Smell.
test_queries: large flying monster that uses necrotic attacks
slippery monster that frightens its prey
creature that sees through magical darkness
aggressive beast with strong physical attacks
